VREyeParametersRenderWidth.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The renderWidth read-only property of the interface describes the recommended render target width of each eye viewport, in pixels.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This is already in device pixel units, so there's no need to multiply by Window.devicePixelRatio before setting to HTMLCanvasElement.width.

VREyeParametersRenderWidth.value: A number, representing the width in pixels.
